Reviews.Title: Nice camera, easy functions, and very portable
Reviews.Author: BayGadget Gal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera recently because I couldn't take my Canon T1i on a trip (too big). I used a friend's 20x optical zoom Canon Powershot and then looked for something comparable. The 30x optical zoom is impressive. The camera is light and fits in my purse. I was able to shoot from greater distances with very nice quality. The camera doesn't come with any detailed operational instructions and I haven't been able to make the sound playback through the camera on video recordings. Sound does play fine once transferred to my computer. There is a downloadable manual I have yet to find. Video quality was good even in low light. Being able to zoom during video recording is an added plus. The flash must be raised manually which is very different (and a bit inconvenient on auto mode) from previous DSLR or point and shoot cameras I've owned. The fish eye setting is a fun effect. Turning the dial to change settings allows for mode display on the screen. Very helpful. Mode settings are easy to access and manage. Manual settings can be altered easily so far (still figuring out some navigation). Easy to start recording video. NOTE: BATTERY DRAINS VERY FAST. Have a spare or two if you're shooting and don't have access or time to charge batteries. I have two and plan to buy a third even though it's an added expense. All in all, well worth the purchase so far.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price...good for budding photographers.
Reviews.Author: Smittyncrew
Reviews.Content: Got this unit for my 13 year old daughter who was showing interest in photography.  The ability to shoot in manual mode combined with the intro-level tripod, and the smaller camera body size, made it ideal for her.  Using the 2-second delay, she can get good steady low light or night shots using a longer exposure.  The light meter works great when doing this.  Just dial the shutter speed until the meter on the lcd is in the middle, hit the shutter button, and get your hands off the camera within the 2 second delay that you can set.  Great results.  On the tripod, of coarse.  As far as automatic point and shoot with flash, the results were very good as well.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I hoped for.
Reviews.Author: TundraMac
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace an aging Kodak. The price and the style of camera were what drew me to this camera.  My old 5mp camera (built like this camera) was showing it's age by being slow to focus in auto and sometimes not flashing when required. I suspect the electronic controls in my Kodak are starting to fail. All of the Reviews I read said the 16mp Cannon Powershot SX500is would take great pictures and it came with a 30X zoom. Well, maybe taking pictures at family gatherings was not what everyone else did with their camera. I took well over 100-shots at multi-gatherings just after the new year and I did not have a single shot I thought was worth posting on facebook, Let alone sending to get printed. I have friends of friends on facebook who post that I take great pictures with my old Kodak. The photos taken with my new Canon were all grainy or over-exposed. I finally found that if I partly covered the flash with my finger, I would get enough light to take and not so little as to be under-exposed. But I had not mastered the way to do it and keep my eyes on the prize at the same time. Yet it was still for them to be grainy looking. The pictures looked as though I was shooting with a 2.5mp camera. Maybe it was just this camera and not all of the Powershot SX500is's out there. The package of items that came with this camera was great and I could put everything but the full size tripod in the case. The extra battery was not a Canon product but it did work,Now I know there are ways to adjust everything on this camera. And I would have done that, but the LED screen also had a fault.  Vertical streaks that take up about 30% of the screen would come and go depending on what was in the view finder.  Blue clothing or bright room lighting would cause it to act up. If it was acting up from the beginning after a few weeks I just knew it would completely fail either after I could not return it or after the warranty ended.  I had another 2-week before returning was not going to be a choice with Amazon.  My wife and I shoot a lot of my pictures in auto-mode and I need a camera to simply take the shot.  I need it to be a quality piece of equipment and just produce good pictures.I returned the whole package after about 2-weeks and so far the process has gone fine. I am due to get my refund any time. Amazon even paid for the return of this camera kit. It looks like the only thing it will cost me is the shipping promotion. I guess if you get the "free super saver shipping" on your Amazon purchase, you have to pay back the shipping fee if the item is returned. My refund was reduced $8.25 to repay them for the free shipping. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lake
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  Works well and is easy to use. If you take a lot of pictures purchasing an SD card may be a good idea.  No complaints.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: couplafish
Reviews.Content: I love my Canon PowerShot SX500 bundle. I have taken thousands of photos and the zoom is amazing. I have zoomed in on boats miles out on the coast from my hotel room. It does great videos and is easy to transfer to my computer. I'm not a professional but I do take a lot of photos, Both family, and scenic photos and this camera does it all without being bulky.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Nelson Ventura
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera that takes excellent pictures. I love all the accessories that came with it too. I got it all for a great price. The bag is spacious. The portable tripod fits right in the bag along with all the other accessories except for the tall tripod. I already used the camera and the pictures look great. The only downside is no view finder.

Reviews.Title: Smokin deal!
Reviews.Author: Cliff B
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas present for my spouse.  Overall the package was a great deal... assuming that the camera is what you want.  I really like it because it's a great blend between a point n shoot and a full on DSLR.  The package deal is really worth it for the two tripods and the extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera and Great deal on the Bundle
Reviews.Author: Megan Burch
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal. It's everything I wanted in a camera and for the deal...it was a great price. I didn't expect to get a good camera, bag, 32GB card, tripod, extra battery and all the other stuff it came with for under $300. (including shipping). Great deal. The camera alone is $230. Awesome. THANKS!

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Phillip s. Bies
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera who wants something just short of a full SLR.  All kinds of functions and easy to use.  Not just a point and shoot but if that's what you want,  you got it.  Good all around camera.

Reviews.Title: I like this bundle!
Reviews.Author: Landis Odoms
Reviews.Content: My old digital camera stopped working. It was a Fuji. I got it years ago. It was not a bad product as it served me well. I had to set out to buy a new camera.  I did my research and decided to go with Canon.  The bundle was an added bonus.  I now need to learn how to use the camera.  I think this was a good idea because the bundle offers more than just the basic camera. I also wanted a camera where I could do videos as well.

Reviews.Title: Rating for product
Reviews.Author: Peter Ransom
Reviews.Content: While the bundle seems ok, there were a few limitations we were unaware of. One is that you cannot switch out and change lenses as the one that came with is fixed. The other is, in order to use any filters for effects, you need an adapter in order to attach any filters.In addition, one thing that happened while it was shipped was the package that contained some cleaning materials and mini tripod broke open during shipment so the materials inside were saturated with the fluid and other cleaners in that portion.

Reviews.Title: Very sporty
Reviews.Author: S. Couture
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how lightweight the camera is.  The seller was very generous with all the extras. The rechargeable battery was the clincher for me.  I have another PowerShot but it takes AA's and is a real battery hog.

Reviews.Title: Warning:  This store sells phony Canon Camers.
Reviews.Author: Leisa D. Creo
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Canon camera from this seller in November of 2012.  This past summer I went on vacation and noticed that the battery was draining very quickly.  When I came home, I went to the Canon website to find out how to send it in for service.  One of the things I needed for Canon was the serial number of the camera.  When I looked, THERE WAS NO SERIAL NUMBER.  The camera is not a real Canon.  When Amazon made an inquiry, the only response was "We're sorry. More than 90 days have passed since you placed this order from aSavings."  I am very disappointed, but even more so with Amazon for not doing anything about it at all.Don't purchase from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Canonon
Reviews.Author: Brandi Nicole hogeboon
Reviews.Content: Way smaller then expected but works amazing. I was really shocked once I figured everything on it out its better then my t93. Rebel

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: xmasden
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Takes very, very clear pictures.  I haven't really used all theaccessories yet.  I take a lot of pictures without using the flash....it doesa great job!

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up!
Reviews.Author: gin
Reviews.Content: Loving my new camera.... i recommend this to anyone who is using a camera for the first time or who has some skills in photography.

Reviews.Title: happy wife
Reviews.Author: a. lemke
Reviews.Content: Happy wife happy life. All memories are not created equal unless they are with this package. Novice use easy.expert results .......for sure!

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera
Reviews.Author: Jill J.
Reviews.Content: Nothing more to say but this is a very nice little  camera,  especially for teens or beginners.  good cost for the whole package.

Reviews.Title: I have not received my camera
Reviews.Author: favio
Reviews.Content: I bought a camera canon sx500 is by Amazon on 30 November 2013, today is January 29, 2014 and I have not yet received, they only replied by e-mail that is in investigation because they do not return the money and I should not keep waiting .I think they are not serious and lack of commitment to us, customers.I trust that they will give a prompt solution to this problem, I have read comments from other buyers and therefore buy this camera, I do not know when it will be in my hands to enjoy

Reviews.Title: MISLEADING IMAGE
Reviews.Author: william sumrall
Reviews.Content: IMAGE SHOWS A FULL SIZE CAMERA, ITS SMALL. CARRY CASE IS NOT FOR THIS CAMERA AND IS TO SMALL TO CARRY EVERYTHING NECESSARY TO OPERATE THE CAMERA. THE BIG TRIPODE IS THIN AND SHAKY. THE SMALL TRIPODE IS USELESS. THE CLEANING SOLUTION THAT CAME WITH IT CAME OPEN IN THE BOX. EVERYTHING WAS WET. I WAS INTENDING ON BUYING A FULLSIZE CAMERA NOT A SMALL DIGITAL CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: kell Atherton
Reviews.Content: GOT THIS FOR MY WIFE AS A PRESENT. WORKS VERY WELL. I STILL CAN'T BELIEVE I GOT IT FOR THE PRICE I DID.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle !
Reviews.Author: Wilbert Jackson
Reviews.Content: This is a out standing bundle everything was shipped in one package that you see on in the display. Iam enjoying my new Camera it takes beautiful pics.Great price for all the items.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Lorrie Jaramillo
Reviews.Content: Camera is very easy to use and takes excellent  pictures.  I would recommend this camera to first time users.  The accessory package had everything I need.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Christina B.
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal. I was tired of carring my larger Canon camera on long trips and this is just the right size camera.Great accessory package.

Reviews.Title: Broken Tripod
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: How can I return/get a replacement for the tripod which we discovered had a broken handle when we opened the package?

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: SConley
Reviews.Content: Such a great camera!!! I purchased this for my 13 year old daughter for Christmas. It is the perfect size for her hands. Easy to use. Takes beautiful, clear pictures. I was very pleased with the accessories as well.

Reviews.Title: Alot for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Jackelyn
Reviews.Content: I priced a lot of cameras for my daughter. I found this one and at the time the camera alone was $299.00 at the least. I found this bundle kit. I spent less than $280.00 for all this. Great value for such a good camera.  My daughter opened it xmas morning. and it was everything I expected it to be. She's happy and so am I.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Michael A Carlson
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  It came with everything you need to get up and running.  It arrived quickly and we could not ask for a better quality product

Reviews.Title: Great Deal.
Reviews.Author: Dennis A. Pratt "Stop me before I read Again!"
Reviews.Content: My order arrived in 3 days, and the contents matched up with the ad.  The price would have been high for just the camera, but the extra battery, the tripod, the 32 GB memory card, etc. sort of evened it out.  This was a gift for my wife and she needed a good camera that was easy to operate, and one that didn't require replacing batteries every other day.  2 rechargeable batteries will be quite useful.  A fair price for a solid piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: Bought for a wedding gift
Reviews.Author: Donna Honeyman
Reviews.Content: Our son recently got married and we searched until we found the Canon set.  What an amazing deal.  Our son and his new wife were thrilled and the pictures the camera take are crisp!  Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Purchase of 2 canon powerShot S 500
Reviews.Author: Rudolph.V.I.Ramcharran
Reviews.Content: One Tripod did not pack...as a matter of fact i did not get what i paid for. The producct is OK

Reviews.Title: Mermaid Lover
Reviews.Author: Karen Kelly Tobin
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my niece for high school graduation. She loved that all of the little goodies came with. Takes great photos and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Beth sp
Reviews.Content: Very impressed, takes amazing pictures even out the window of our truck going 60 mph on the interstate! Customer service is also great!

Reviews.Title: Great quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Tony Owens
Reviews.Content: Great camera and accessories for the price. My wife and I are very pleased with the quality of pictures it takes.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: bought this for our 13 year old granddaughter and she loves it easy to use and she has taken great pictures with it

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use.
Reviews.Author: kenneth
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be a very easy camera to use. I wish the battery lasted a little longer.

Reviews.Title: Powershot SX500
Reviews.Author: canoesalot
Reviews.Content: Camera has a very nice zoom feature. However, processing between shots is somewhat slow and user menu takes some getting use to. Jury is still out on recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Powershots!!
Reviews.Author: Lennox Phillip "L.P"
Reviews.Content: Takes GREAT photos! We have wonderful memories of our last vacation on board the Royal Caribbean's Allure of the Seas!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot sx500
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price... 16 MP afford me the option to take quality shots... I also enjoyed the HD quality in making short films

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ray Lumpkin
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with great book. It has been years since I owned a camera and I am having a ball.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture
Reviews.Author: PacoPR
Reviews.Content: Is a very good camera. I didn't gave 5(*) because of I to prefer the camera that you can to move the screen and to close this too.

Reviews.Title: Good Beginner Camera
Reviews.Author: Georgia Jules "Georgia Girl"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my granddaughter's 16th birthday.  She is just beginning to play around with photography and this was just right.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Shanemrr03
Reviews.Content: My order was everything I expected and more. I didn't realize all the accessories were name brand, pretty sweet! The order was prompt and on time, thank you!

Reviews.Title: BRING IT ON ...
Reviews.Author: Paul Sturgis "Dlmarva"
Reviews.Content: WOW!  when you kick in this SX 500 , 30 X zoom, you feel like you are right there with the subject.  I can now get flower and bird shots I never thought possible without having to figure the path to subject closeness.  Absolutely puts fun in photo taking.  I can imagine what some of my desktop backgrounds will look like now!

Reviews.Title: great step up from old canon point and shoot
Reviews.Author: frank allison
Reviews.Content: camera does everything advertised, this was a gift purchased for my daughter, and she loves it, she advises that right out of the box she started taking pictures, and the quality was much much better than her old canon point and shoot camera. I'm sure that after she reads the manual and watches the dvd , she will love it even more.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Machinekid
Reviews.Content: my girlfriend does professional photography and just loves this camera i bout it for her as a gift and just cant believe the quality and accessories for under $300

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot SX500
Reviews.Author: Chris Luongo
Reviews.Content: Camera and kit both worked out great.  Shipped fast and everything you need was in included in the package.  The photos came out great, a really good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: AKKSKRK
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle for my granddaughter she is 13, she has had all different types of cameras and had want a better camera.  She has taken great pictures with it.  Some of the reviews said wasn't for a beginner, she isn't quite a beginner but close and hasn't had any trouble working this camera.  This will last her till she want a professional camera.  The pictures are clear, the tripod was so useful for her.  I recommend this camera bundle for anyone wanting to enjoy taking photos.

Reviews.Title: awesome bundle
Reviews.Author: Liza Morris "caitlyn's mommy"
Reviews.Content: you cannot beat this bundle at this price!!! I love the camera it is amazing! simple to use and takes crisp pics! I have always owned kodak cameras so I wasn't sure which camera to go with but this is definitely an awesome replacement!!! And the bundle, you can't ask for more you get everything you need and more!!! A must have!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and acessories
Reviews.Author: Luciana
Reviews.Content: Everything is working well and the Accessory Kit is really good!The only con is the flash of the camera you need to open manually.

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: Randy J Miller
Reviews.Content: This product was descibed as a bundle with many accessories, I am very happy with thae items included, It has saved me a ton of money

Reviews.Title: Love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Claudia Rathbun
Reviews.Content: Of course I have always been a fan of Canon cameras. The pictures I have taken have come out good and the camera is small and nice and light weight, so is easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I would purchase more of these in the future because it is an excellent buy for the amount spent!!I would recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Outstnding camera
Reviews.Author: MovieFreak
Reviews.Content: It gets four stars because of the camera...if it was just the camera it would have gotten five stars...I would have gone for four and a half if that was avaiable.Pros  Quick and easy with great photos. Case has plenty of room for all the cables, charger extra batteries and memory card wallet (the wallet is awsome incidently, very handy).  Includes the hdmi to mini hdmi cable and a very handy memeory card reader to avoid installing all the bloat-ware on your computer to get your photos directly from the camera.  Having an extra battery is also uber convenient.Cons  Seems a little slow to focus though admittely could the non-default settings.  The large tripod is not super stable.  The universal sceen protector is usless in my book, unless you don't mind looking through bubbles.

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot SX500
Reviews.Author: Lucy Hayes
Reviews.Content: For a beginner, love this camera. The shutter is slow but the extras are well worth the purchase. The pictures quality is great.

Reviews.Title: A STEAL!
Reviews.Author: Mojo912x
Reviews.Content: I was looking into buying a low-end/starter DSLR for my job on campus and this is exactly what I was looking for:Everything I got was brand new, never been used and all works great.The camera itself is quite small, but it's easy to carry around and a great choice for someone who isn't interested in lugging a larger camera around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: J. Forness "A. Forness,"
Reviews.Content: Great little point and shoot camera.  I am not a professional photographer, so this little camera does everything I need it to do.  Great buy for the price.  The camera bag that came in this kit is a bit small for my needs.  It holds the camera and that is about all.  The large tripod seems sufficient, but the smaller one is not as flexible as some I have seen available.

Reviews.Title: Loving this camera!
Reviews.Author: Harry's Mom "KFrey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at Christmas & it took great pictures!  Also love all of the accessories that came with it!!  Still trying to figure out some of the manual adjustment features but it is a great camera for someone not quite ready for a big fancy DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Good package deal for the cost, good little camera, with all the extra's.
Reviews.Author: Teresa R Lake
Reviews.Content: So far I have liked the camera, I didn't know how not having a view finder would work but it works well with the large screen. I'm happy with all the extra's. I think it will be a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: for Katie
Reviews.Author: Gail S. "Gail"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera pkg for daughter. She loves camera....we loved the package  (all accessories together). Could not find better price for all this!

Reviews.Title: Excellent package.
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: My wife was hinting about a new digital camera.  So I thought what a perfect Christmas gift!  I started looking and saw several package deals available but this one stuck out.  Wow, what a reaction by my wife!!! I gave it to her a few days before Christmas so she could use it when the grandkids were here to open their gifts. It went great!  She's still learning some of the details of the camera but has the overall function down. And with all the accessories that came with it for the price, I was very pleased!!!!  Thanks for making a great Christmas gift!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: mlt82
Reviews.Content: It takes great pics. The only thing I don't like is it takes a sec for the pic to take instead of an instant shot.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for money
Reviews.Author: Bella3
Reviews.Content: It is a nice camera. It came with a lot of extras for the price. The camera is a nice size. Not the biggest one Canon has. It's a lighter weight camera. The zoom gets close.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Michael Jadooram
Reviews.Content: Do your research on the camera before you buy. This is an excellent value for what you get. The only thing the camera lacks is the panoramic option. Everything else is solid. Picture quality is superb. Easy to to set up and go. I use this camera to take pictures of houses for listings. It's not an expensive DSLR. But, it will give you a lot of the features that the more expensive cameras have. Also, The 16MP is overrated because it's just a marketing ploy. I've used the comparable Fuji, Nikon and Olympus. This Canon outperforms them all. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great SLR for beginners
Reviews.Author: Photo Sparker
Reviews.Content: This Canon SLR is a great camera for beginners like myself. The package just made it so much better, any and everything needed to begin an awesome hobby was included. Happy Shooting!

Reviews.Title: Behind my expectation!
Reviews.Author: Souleymane Kone
Reviews.Content: Great Deal.I feel like I got too much for the price I paid for this camera. Every single item in the package is brand new. For me It's too good to be true. That's why I am wondering if the camera itself is really new. So far I don't have any proof to support this doubt. And the purchase helped me solve another trouble I encountered with my memory card from another camera. In fact, the card reader offered in this package let me see my photos in my computer. I was so glad.If you want to be like a professional in photography, this is something you need to start with. You will enjoy this purchase , and I am 100% sure.

Reviews.Title: Awseome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeremey
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a b-day gift for my wife. She loves it! Its a great camera with easy to use features. The pictures are great and she couldn't be any happier with the extras that came with it. Like some of the other reviews it does take better shots outdoors with bright light. Focus Camera was very helpful and prompt with solving a manufacturer issue with the tripod in the bundle. I am very happy with my experience with them and will definitely be a repeat customer. Thank you Focus Camera!

Reviews.Title: I love the Canon Camera!
Reviews.Author: Wanda M
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures.....clear pictures, I like the distance, (zoom)Yes, I would recommend this camera......to friends and family!Good size.

Reviews.Title: Not worth for the money u pay
Reviews.Author: Arun Vishwanath
Reviews.Content: Had great expectation on canon cameras. But this camera does not keep up to its expectation. Horrible noise introduced in all the pic i clicked

Reviews.Title: Picture quality
Reviews.Author: adhoo
Reviews.Content: The picture quality was not as good as I was expecting for a camera with 16MP capabilities.  Wish I could return it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed - slow shutter, not for action shots
Reviews.Author: shamin miller
Reviews.Content: I am extremely disappointed in this camera.  It advertises its great for action shots.  I bought it to take pictures of my daughter playing softball.  The shutter is EXTREMELY slow and where as it does catch some decent shots - you get on one shot per series so you have to try and push the shutter button just right.  Great for stills but not the camera for capturing pictures of moving kids and their sports.

Reviews.Title: I lve this camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: karen eddinger
Reviews.Content: This camera is just what I was looking for.I wanted a camera that took better pictures than a point and shoot but not as big as a larger  camera.I took it on vacation and got beautiful pictures ,it has a great zoom also.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality and very easy menu
Reviews.Author: Stanxpress
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality and very easy to operate. Has so many useful features and nice 3' LCD screen. I cannot find any fault with this camera at the moment.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Winford H. Long "winbeth"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. It has all the features I will ever need. It is easy to use and the pictures are sharp. I would recommend this camera to everyone. The bundle has just about everything you will need and it all comes at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Zachy Yonk
Reviews.Content: The Camera is amazing and the additional items make it even better. I would recommend this to a friend. In my opinion it's worth it to get if you have the money, and better to get this camera if your starting out in photography.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bundle for a great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: L. Ja
Reviews.Content: I really liked the camera and wanted to buy a spare battery pack and a 32GB memory card. The price for all these was comparable to the price of the bundle and I got so much more with tripods, camera case, etc. The flexible tripod is really handy for indoor pictures.Did not give 5 stars because the extra battery pack is not Canon.All in all a great bundle for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Cesar Marcano
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations, is one excelent product. Is a dream come true. I love this camera. I recomended amply.

Reviews.Title: A Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Good Friend
Reviews.Content: I think that this camera is great for someone who loves taking great photos and the zoom lens is fantastic. Its a great buy and I have no regrets getting this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good offer
Reviews.Author: noeen
Reviews.Content: I was hesitated to order it online because of no review. But i go tit today. And i really liked everything in packet...its really economical.....i'll use it and 'll get back sooner :)

Reviews.Title: Not the Best by a long shot..
Reviews.Author: M. Vermilye
Reviews.Content: Returned the camera as it was not the camera I thought it would be. Very simple, amateurist, with little to offer. I would not recommend it at all.

Reviews.Title: great experiance - i have not got the parcel
Reviews.Author: Raghu
Reviews.Content: I told the courier to leave the parcel in front door, but they are telling that they left the parcel in front door, but when i reached the home the parcel was not there, really i dont whom i dont know whose mistake it is, but at the end of the day i am the looser!!!ReagrdsLooser

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 11 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional NB-6L Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Focus Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap
Focus Full Size 50" Tripod w/Case - Focus Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Focus Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV - 25 FREE Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Black) + NB-6L Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
